definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pl cstr. [[חוֹכֵי]] Is 30:18; with [[לְ]] waiting for him (´[[י]]).
wait, tarry, abs. 2Ki 9:3 tarry not; with [[עַד]] till morning light 2Ki 7:9; c. acc. [[את איוב]] [[בדברים]] Job 32:4 tarry for Job with words.
wait (in ambush), [[כְּחַכֵּי אִישׁ גְּדוּדִים]] Ho 6:9 as marauding bands wait for a man AV RV De, or as marauders lie in wait Hi Ew (taking [[אישׁ]] as cstr.)

wait for, long for, with [[לְ]] for ´[[י]] Is 8:17, Is 64:3, Zep 3:8, Ps 33:20; for his counsel Ps 106:13; for his vision Hb Hab 2:3; for death Job 3:21; [[יחכה יהוה לחננכם]] Yahweh waiteth to be gracious unto you Is 30:18 (Di regards this as threatening and refers it to
); abs. waiteth (and cometh to the days of blessedness) Da 12:12.
